posts.post_content:
I sent it some of my t205's and these came back A's.   SGC said there was some color added.  I can't tell where or how much (if you see where, feel free to PM me so I can learn).  They're nice, stiff cards with either a corner crease or super light, spider-type lines.  I'll note that stuff below.   $20 each.  $2.00 postage.Please EMAIL if interested.   Thanks,   peter

Byrne - crease lower left.  SOLD
Wilson - light spider-lines near forehead and cap SOLD
Maddox - very faint creases above his name.  SOLD
Quinn - very small crease upper right corner  SOLD
Lever - light crease upper left corner  SOLD
Knight  -slight bend on upper right.   Still Available
